name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: help wanted
description: Extra attention is needed

name: good first issue
description: Good for newcomers

name: status: abandoned
description: The issue or pull request will not be worked on

name: status: blocked
description: Progress on the issue is blocked

name: status: in progress
description: Work in progress

name: status: proposal
description: Request for comments

name: status: PR welcome
description: Welcome to pull request

name: status: PR review needed
description: Request for review comments and approvals/disapprovals

name: status: need more info
description: Lacks enough info to make progress

name: type: BREAKING CHANGE
description: Includes Breaking Changes

name: type: feat
description: A new feature or request

name: type: bug
description: A bug or bug fix

name: type: docs
description: Documentation only changes

name: type: style
description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

name: type: refactor
description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

name: type: perf
description: A code change that improves performance

name: type: test
description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests (jest, storybook)

name: type: build
description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (npm, webpack, babel)

name: type: ci
description: Changes to CI/CD configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Cloud Build, GitHub Actions, etc)

name: type: chore
description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files

name: type: revert
description: Reverts a previous commit

name: type: maintenance
description: Repository maintenance

name: type: question
description: Further information is requested
